title: Sundance Film Festival Says Goodbye to Park City and Robert Redford
summary: The Sundance Film Festival is a big event for independent movies that happens every year in Park City, Utah. This year, it is a little sad because the festival is saying goodbye to Park City, where it has been held for a long time, and to its founder, Robert Redford, who passed away recently. Next year, the festival will move to Boulder, Colorado. At the festival, people watch many different movies, including comedies, dramas, and thrillers, and they celebrate old favorite films like 'Little Miss Sunshine'. Stars like Natalie Portman and new filmmakers come to share their work. Sundance helps filmmakers start their careers by showing their movies to big audiences. Many people are excited to see what will happen next as the festival changes and grows in a new place.

background_read: The Sundance Film Festival is an important event in the United States that helps new filmmakers show their movies. It started many years ago and has been held in Park City, Utah. Robert Redford, a famous actor and director, created it to support independent films, which are movies made by people without big companies. This year, the festival is changing because it will move to a new city and Redford is no longer alive. Many people love Sundance because it gives chances to filmmakers and shows exciting movies.
Article_Structure: WHO: The Sundance Film Festival, filmmakers like Gregg Araki and Daniel Roher, and stars like Natalie Portman.
WHAT: The festival is happening with movies and events, but it is saying goodbye to Park City and founder Robert Redford, and will move to Boulder next year.
WHERE: Park City, Utah, and next year Boulder, Colorado.
WHY: To celebrate independent movies and support filmmakers, while dealing with changes after Redford's death and moving locations.

perspectives.description: Many people see this year's festival as a happy time to remember old movies and Redford's impact.
Some feel sad because the festival is leaving Park City and Redford is gone.
